text: This page describes the qualifying procedure for the 1986 UEFA European Under-16 Football Championship. 28 teams were divided into 13 groups of two and three teams each. The twelve best winners advanced to the final tournament. ==Results== ===Group 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !width=180|Team !width=20|Pld !width=20|W !width=20|D
